document_data.mainbody:
Bondari, also known as Bondari Quickhand or Bondari Halfman, was a novice adventurer and thief.
The adventurer owned a standard set of leather armor and a shortsword.
Bondari first lived in a peaceful village in the Dales. He decided to leave to seek fame and fortune, and met his fellow adventurers, Nanoc and Tim Goldenhand in a tavern. From there, they foolishly decided to enter the Underdark, and he encountered the mad wizard Iycanths creations. The creatures quickly petrified the trio, turning them to stone.
His companions mocked him for not being able to backstab a floating eyeball.
